summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image displays a game interface focused on the "Equipment" section, specifically highlighting the "Non-Void" epic item. This item has a low Qi cost and features the "Flash Step" ability, allowing the player to take the form of Non-Void, creating a sweeping after-image that is intangible and invincible to foes. In combat, the ability can be activated by pressing "F." The equipped effect of Non-Void recovers a moderate amount of stamina when hit. The interface also shows a demo of the ability in action, with options to close the demo, watch it again, or equip the item. Various statistics are listed on the right side, including health, stamina, and other attributes. The left side displays a grid of spirits available for selection.
